name: Sword Rage
description:
Deliver your packages on time!

All this slow traffic is preventing you from doing a good job as a delivery man. Use your mighty sword to destroy any cars that get in your way. Be careful though, the military is sent to stop you from your rampage!

Controls:

WASD for steering

Mouse to aim and fire your sword

Created by Jubliani and JeffCube

Credits:
